title: Foodsply.me
author: Foodsply.me
created_time: February 13, 2023, 09:37:59 PMLast edit: February 13, 2023, 10:06:44 PM by Foodsply.me
content: We are a startup an agri tech startup, basically we turn food into NFTS, not exactly an erc-721 token.We are looking for a designer who can develop a amazing front end for our fund raise.This position is strictly paid in our token. We Need - Talented Designer UI/UX- Create a captivating funding ICO/IDO Page- Design white paperYou Require- Lover of agriculture- Get pre-launch tokens- Explore Growth PotentialThis great is a opportunity to join an early stage start-up, or receive a payout.

comments.author: nioctib_100
comments.body: I'm a web developer, and I've worked in the space for quite a few years now, and I'm currently in between projects. If you need web design, logo design, etc., I can possibly assist. Please DM me, and we can discuss the project a little bit further. This is a new account due to issues with my previous one, but I've been here in crypto and on Bitcointalk since 2015. Having contributed to quite a few projects in the past, some successful and some not, I've seen what works and what doesn't. Beyond just web development/graphic design, I can be a valuable advisor and can leverage a few legacy connections I have in the industry.
